DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of the Server of track information.
Identification of the User of track information
DataItem.DataItemNote: The User numbers are predefined in the User registration data base of the ARTAS Unit to which the User wants to connect.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Absolute time stamping of the message in the form of elapsed time since last midnight.
DataItem.DataItemNote: This is the time at which a message is filled and not the time at which the data-block containing the tracks is sent. The time of the day value is reset to 0 at every midnight.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of the service(s) to which a track message belongs.

DataItemFormat.desc: Variable length data item comprising a first part of one byte followed by a 1-byte extent as necessary.

Bits.BitsName: Track selected by the Background service
Track selected by the Complementary service 1
Track selected by the Complementary service 2
Track selected by the Complementary service 3
Track selected by the Complementary service 4
Track selected by the Complementary service 5

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: This data item allows for a more convenient handling of the message at the receiver side by further defining the type of transaction.

Bits.BitsName: Family to which the message belongs
Nature of the message (within its family)

DataItem.DataItemNote: the Slave Track Promotion Messages are related to the inter-ARTAS cooperation and cannot be served to the normal track information Users.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of an ARTAS track (track number)
DataItem.DataItemNote: Unlike the ARTAS track number I030/050, the track number does not change when a track enters or leaves an ARTAS Domain of Cooperation. It remains unchanged as long as the track exists.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of an ARTAS track

DataItemFormat.desc: Variable length data item comprising a first part of three bytes (Master Track Number), followed by up to 5 extents of three bytes (Slave Track Numbers).

DataItem.DataItemNote: The ARTAS UNIT IDENTIFICATION NUMBERS will be given as soon as the systems will be implemented.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Mode 3/A identity associated to the track
DataItem.DataItemNote: A change of track Mode 3/A (C = 1) is indicated during 30 seconds after the code has changed. (V) and (G) are extracted from the last Mode 3/A that was used to update the track.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Absolute time stamping of the information provided in the track message, in the form of elapsed time since last midnight.
DataItem.DataItemNote: In ARTAS, this is the time at which the track is extrapolated by the Server in case of periodical service. Otherwise, this is the update time of the track state vector by the Tracker. The time of the day value is reset to 0 at every midnight.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Status of an ARTAS track.

DataItemFormat.desc: Variable length data item comprising a first part of one byte, followed by 1-byte extents as necessary.

Bits.BitsValue: Track updated using Aircraft Derived Data
Track not updated using Aircraft Derived Data
both PR and SSR Multiradar track
slant range corrected track coordinates using tracked MODE C information.
slant range corrected track coordinates using triangulated track height or height derived from coverage
slant range correction using assumed height
non slant range corrected track coordinates
confirmed flight plan to track correlation
track not correlated to a flight plan
Formation flight : more than one aircraft may correspond to the track.
Special Position Indication in the last SSR plot that was used to update the track
Accurate estimation of the track Transponder Delay enabling correction of the plots associated to the track.
Estimation of the track Transponder Delay not accurate enough to enable the plots correction.
Default track position coding precision (1/64 NM)

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: ARTAS Track Quality

DataItemFormat.desc: One byte fixed length data item.

Bits.BitsName: ARTAS track quality = 0 (low quality) to 7 (high quality)

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Calculated position of an aircraft expressed in Cartesian coordinates.
DataItem.DataItemNote: A scaling factor of f=1 is required for any User defining a Domain of Interest extending beyond a square of approximately 1024 NM X 1024 NM centred on the Unit Centre Point (i.e. the origin of the stereographic projection) of the ARTAS Unit to which it is connected. In this case, LSB will be 1/32 NM and the maximum coding range will be approximately 2048 NM (- 1024 NM .. 1023.968 NM ). The scaling factor is defined in item I252/340.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated position of an aircraft expressed in Cartesian coordinates.
DataItem.DataItemNote: Accuracy concerns both X and Y coordinate components.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Mode 2 code associated to the track
DataItem.DataItemNote: A change of track Mode 2 (C = 1) is indicated during 30 seconds after the code has changed. (V) and (G) are extracted from the last Mode 2 that was used to update the track.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Calculated altitude of an aircraft.
DataItem.DataItemNote: SRC indicates the source used to compute the altitude.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated altitude of an aircraft.
Mode C code of the last nearest neighbour plot containing a Mode C and used to update the track.

Bits.BitsName: Validity indicator of the Flight Level

DataItem.DataItemNote: The VAL and GC indications are derived from the local track/plot message.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Last validated and credible Mode C value used to update the track.
DataItem.DataItemNote: There are tracker parameters that determine whether the validity and garbled indicators are considered in the determination of the last validated and credible Mode C.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Calculated Flight Level of the track (isobar).
DataItem.DataItemNote: The QNH is not processed in ARTAS : bit QNC is always 0.

DataItem.DataItemName: Estimated Accuracy of Calculated Track Flight Level
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated Flight Level of the track (isobar).
A set of track related ages.

Bits.BitsName: Age of the last primary plot/local track used to update the track
Age of the last secondary plot/local track used to update the track
Age of the last detection of the mode A contained in the track mode A item I030/060.
Age of the last valid and credible mode C used to update the track, contained in I030/150.

DataItem.DataItemNote: The ages are counted from I030/070 TIME OF LAST UPDATE, using the following formula : age = I030/070 - time. If the computed age is greater than the maximum value or if the associated information has never been received, then the maximum value is returned. If the computed age is negative, then 0 is returned. The track mode A is contained in I030/060 TRACK MODE 3/A. The last valid and credible mode C is contained in I030/150 MEASURED TRACK MODE C.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Calculated track velocity expressed in polar coordinates.
Calculated track velocity expressed in Cartesian coordinates.
Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated track velocity expressed in polar coordinates.
Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated track velocity expressed in Cartesian coordinates.
Calculated Mode-of-Flight of an aircraft.
Probabilities attached to the Transversal, longitudinal and Vertical components of a calculated Mode-of-Flight.

Bits.BitsName: probability associated to the assessment of the Transversal Acceleration Mode-of-Flight Component.
probability associated to the assessment of the Longitudinal Acceleration Mode-of-Flight Component.
probability associated to the assessment of the Vertical Acceleration Mode-of-Flight Component.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Calculated rate of Climb/Descent of an aircraft
DataItem.DataItemNote: A positive value represents a rate of climb and a negative value represents a rate of descent.

DataItem.DataItemName: Estimated Accuracy of Rate of Climb/Descend
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated rate of Climb/Descent of an aircraft.
Calculated Rate of Turn expressed in degrees per second.
DataItem.DataItemNote: A positive value represents a right turn, whereas a negative value represents a left turn.

DataItem.DataItemName: Estimated Accuracy of Rate of Turn
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of a calculated Rate of Turn expressed in degrees per second.
Identification of the radar station from which has been received the last plot/local track used to update an ARTAS track.
The local track number is an integer value representing a unique reference to a track record within a particular track file e.g. the track data-base of a radar local tracker.
A set of plot related ages.

Bits.BitsName: Age of the last mode A used to update the track and contained in item I030/340.
Age of the last mode C used to update the track and contained in I030/140.

DataItem.DataItemNote: The ages are counted from I030/070 TIME OF LAST UPDATE, using the following formula : age = I030/070 - time. If the computed age is greater than the maximum value or if the associated information has never been received, then the maximum value is returned. If the computed age is negative, then 0 is returned.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Mode 3/A of the last nearest neighbour plot containing a mode 3/A and used to update the track.

Bits.BitsValue: MODE 3/A code as derived from the reply of the transponder,
Smoothed MODE 3/A code as provided by a local tracker

Bits.BitsName: Mode 3/A reply under the form of 4 digits in octal representation

DataItem.DataItemNote: Smoothed MODE 3/A data (L = 1) will be used in case of absence of MODE 3/A code information in the plot or in case of difference between plot and local track MODE 3/A code information.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Measured position of an aircraft in local polar coordinates (information provided in the last plot/local track used to update an ARTAS track).
DataItem.DataItemNote: The measured position is : a. In case of a plot, the measured raw polar coordinates, b. In case of a local track, the measured raw polar coordinates of the plot associated to the track, c. In case of a local track without detection, the extrapolated polar coordinates.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Height of an aircraft measured by a 3-D Radar (Information provided in the last plot/local track used to update an ARTAS track).
Technical Mode-S address used for identification of an aircraft
Aircraft Identification (in 8 characters) obtained from an aircraft equipped with a Mode S transponder.
Communications capability of the transponder and flight status.

Bits.BitsValue: Comm. A and Comm. B capability
Comm. A, Comm. B and Uplink ELM
Comm. A, Comm. B, Uplink ELM and Downlink ELM
no alert, no SPI, aircraft airborne
no alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
alert, SPI, aircraft on ground or airborne
no alert, SPI, aircraft on ground or airborne

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of the Flight Plan Data Processing System from which Flight-Plan related information are preferred by the User
Callsign (in 7 characters) of an aircraft (provided in the Minipln).
The PLN NUMBER is an integer value representing a unique reference to a Flight-plan record within a particular FPPS (Information provided in the minipln).
Flight Category (information provided in the Minipln).
Type of Aircraft indicated in a Minipln.
DataItem.DataItemNote: The types of aircraft are defined in the ICAO Document 4444.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Category of turbulence of an aircraft (information provided in the Minipln).
Departure Airport indicated in a Minipln
DataItem.DataItemNote: The Airport Names are indicated in the ICAO Location Indicators book

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Destination Airport indicated in a Minipln
DataItem.DataItemNote: The Airport Names are indicated in the ICAO Location Indicators book

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: List of successive SSR codes allocated to a flight (Information provided in the minipln).

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of items,

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Current Cleared Flight Level of an aircraft, provided by a FPPS.
Identification of the Current Control Position in charge of an aircraft, as provided by a FPPS
DataItem.DataItemNote: The centre and the control position identification codes have to be defined between communication partners.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Field used to introduce intermediate changes for elementary surveillance

DataItemFormat.desc: One byte length field, followed by a two byte fixed length data item.

Bits.BitsName: Age of the last Mode S Address used to update the track.
Age of the last Mode S Aircraft Identification used to update the track.
